name: Of Bark and Beetles
description:
Of Bark and Beetles is a Tower Defense game where you must defend a tree from the hordes of beetles that are trying to eat it. Choose from a wide selection of 4 towers that are geared towards offense and defense (we had to cut a few towers). Advance through waves of increasing difficulty where more enemies show up and they hit the gym more often. Making your way to Wave 10 (if you can) will anger the beetles enough to call in their boss, the Boss Beetle. This game is endless, so the goal is to just make it as far as you can! Hope you have fun playing this game for a few minutes or a few hours!
